title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.7 - Licensing; registration of vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.7 - Licensing; registration of vehicles

State Regulations

No person shall operate a motor vehicle upon the bridge or
its approaches unless he is duly authorized to operate motor vehicles in the

State of New York. No motor vehicle shall be permitted upon the bridge or its
approaches which is not registered in accordance with the provisions of the law
of the State of New York. Every operator of a motor vehicle on property over
which the authority exercises jurisdiction will present his operator's license
and vehicle registration when demanded by a member of the toll force or police
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
302.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
